attributes.action: Remove human rights for perpetrators of certain crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The vast majority of people living in this country consider the judicial system a joke. What is needed to curb the ever increasing levels of crime are hash deterrents. Jail should no longer be seen as 'cushy', but should be seen as a harsh experience whereby the fear of jail actual deters crime. Therefore, for certain types crimes and for persistent offenders, the jail terms should also result in the lose of the offenders so called human rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
